description: Pancake pillows filled with whipped cream and juicy mango slices. What's not to love? Try this for breakfast or dessert today.
keywords: Pancake,Fakeaway,Pancakes, waffles & French toast,Quick & easy dessert,Sweet pancake
name: Mango Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 215g canned mango slices in syrup, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Place eggs, milk, vanilla and half of the oil in a medium bowl. Whisk to combine. Add flour and sugar, then whisk until smooth. Tint mixture yellow with food colouring.

Heat 1/4 tsp of the remaining oil in a 20cm nonstick frying pan over low heat. Pour 1/4 cup of the mixture in centre of pan, then swirl to evenly cover base of pan. Cook for 1 minute or until pancake is dry to touch and shiny. Using a spatula, turn pancake out onto a board to cool. Repeat with remaining mixture and oil to make 5 pancakes in total, layering sheets of baking paper in between.
Meanwhile, to make filling, beat cream and icing sugar in a medium bowl until stiff peaks form.

To assemble, place 1 pancake shinyside down on a board. Spoon 1/4 cup cream mixture in centre and top with 1 mango piece, then another 1/4 cup cream. Fold in sides, then fold over top and bottom to enclose. Place on a serving plate, seam-side down. Repeat with remaining pancakes, cream mixture and mango. Cut pancakes in half, then serve.
